get.summary: Get permission for a user in an institution
get.description: Determines if the authenticated user possesses a specific permission within the given institution and product context.

post.summary: Resend all user events based on institutionId, userId, and fromDate
post.description: Resends all events for a specific user within a given institution starting from the specified date and time. This endpoint allows administrators to trigger the reprocessing or notification of user-related events that occurred after the provided `fromDate`.

put.summary: Update institution's description across all userInstitution records
put.description: Modifies the description field in all occurrences of `userInstitution` entities associated with a given institutionId. This ensures that the institution's descriptive information is consistently updated across all related user records.

put.summary: Update user's onboarded product creation date
put.description: Updates the `createdAt` timestamp for a user's onboarded product based on the provided institutionId, productId, and list of userIds. This is useful for tracking when a user was onboarded to a specific product within an institution.

get.description: Fetches a list of users associated with a specific institution, applying optional filters such as userId, roles, states, products, and productRoles. This allows for flexible querying based on various user attributes and statuses.

get.summary: Retrieve user's information including product role details
get.description: Fetches detailed information about users associated with a specific institution, including their roles on various products. This endpoint is useful for administrators to obtain comprehensive user-role mappings within an institution.

get.summary: Retrieve paged users with optional query filters
get.description: The API retrieves paged users with optional filters in input as query params

post.summary: Create or update a user by fiscal code
post.description: The createOrUpdateByFiscalCode function is used to create a new user or update an existing one.

201.description: User already has the active role for that product!

get.summary: Retrieve users' emails by institution ID and product ID
get.description: The API retrieves Users' emails using institution id and product id

get.summary: Retrieve multiple users by their user IDs
get.description: Retrieve all users given their userIds

get.summary: Retrieve all SC-Users for DataLake with optional product filter
get.description: Retrieve all SC-User for DataLake filtered by optional productId

post.summary: Search for a user using fiscal code

get.summary: Retrieve user information by userId and optional ProductId
get.description: Retrieves user given userId and optional ProductId

get.summary: Retrieve detailed user information from PDV by userId
get.description: Retrieves user's information from pdv: name, familyName, email, fiscalCode and workContacts

put.summary: Update the status of a user's product
put.description: Service to update user product status

put.summary: Update a user's product status with optional filters
put.description: Update user status with optional filter for institution, product, role and productRole

schema.description: Available values: MANAGER, DELEGATE, SUB_DELEGATE, OPERATOR, ADMIN_EA

put.summary: Update user registry and send notification upon data update
put.description: Service to update user in user-registry and send notification when user data gets updated

post.summary: Update or create a user by userId with a new role
post.description: The createOrUpdateByUserId function is used to update existing user adding userRole.

201.description: User already has the active role for that product!

get.summary: Retrieve a list of users with optional filters and permissions
get.description:
The retrieveUsers function is used to retrieve a list of users from the UserInstitution collection and userRegistry.
At first it try to retrieve a UserInstitution document associated with a logged user (admin)
If this userInstitution object is not null, so user has AdminRole, it try to retriew the userInstitutions filtered by given institutionId, roles, states, products and productRoles
and optional given personId, otherwise it do the same query using the logged user id instead of personId.
After that it retrieve personal user data, foreach userId retrieved, from userRegistry and return a stream of UserDataResponse objects containing the requested user data.

get.summary: Retrieve product information and user roles
get.description: Retrieves products info and role which the user is enabled

get.summary: Retrieve userInstitution data with permitted actions for each product
get.description: Retrieves userInstitution data with list of actions permitted for each user's product

delete.summary: Logically delete the association between institution and product
delete.description: Delete logically the association institution and product

post.summary: Check if the user is manager or Update/create a user by userId with a new role
post.description: Checks if the user is already a manager for the specified product and, if not, creates or updates the user with a new role.

200.description: The user is already a manager for the specified product.

201.description: The user has been created or updated with a new role.
